name: Ride To Canada
description: Ride to Canada is an addictive action-puzzles, in which you will control the rail traffic. Plan routes by controlling the switches to unload or unhook all wagons.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: 2.0 Ghz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: 2.0 Ghz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
